title: Episode 95 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Primary source for episode information including title, air dates, plot summary, credits, and character debuts.

title: Chapter 159 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Source for manga chapter information, including which parts were adapted into Episode 95 and differences between anime and manga.

title: Mera Mera no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed information about the Flame-Flame Fruit, its abilities, techniques (including Hiken), and user history.

title: Portgas D. Ace - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character information about Ace, including his role as 2nd Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and his pursuit of Blackbeard.

title: Mr. Mellow - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information about Mr. Mellow, a Baroque Works Billions member who debuts in Episode 95.

title: Geronimo - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information about Geronimo, a Baroque Works Billions member who debuts in Episode 95 and attacks Ace and Luffy.

title: Nanohana - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information about Nanohana, the port town in Arabasta where most of Episode 95 takes place.

title: Arabasta Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Overview of the Arabasta Arc, providing context for Episode 95's place in the larger story arc.

title: One Piece Music - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information about opening and ending themes, including confirmation that 'Believe' by Folder5 and 'Fish' by The Kaleidoscope were used for Episode 95.

title: Portgas D. Ace Voice - One Piece
author: Behind The Voice Actors
description: Voice actor information for Ace, confirming Toshio Furukawa (Japanese) and Travis Willingham (English).

title: Smoker Voice - One Piece
author: Behind The Voice Actors
description: Voice actor information for Smoker, confirming Ginzō Matsuo and later Mahito Ōba (Japanese) and Greg Dulcie (English).

title: Ginzō Matsuo - Wikipedia
author: Wikipedia Contributors
description: Information about voice actor Ginzō Matsuo, including his death on August 25, 2001, before Episode 95 aired.

title: One Piece (season 4) - Wikipedia
author: Wikipedia Contributors
description: Information about One Piece Season 4, which includes Episode 95, providing context about the Arabasta Arc episodes.

title: One Piece: The Powers and Abilities of Mera Mera no Mi, Explained
author: CBR
description: Article explaining the Mera Mera no Mi's abilities, including detailed information about the Hiken technique.

title: One Piece - Ace to Luffy! Atsuki Omoi to Kyoudai no Kizuna (TV Episode 2002)
author: IMDb
description: IMDb listing for Episode 95, confirming air date and providing additional production information.
